registration process

This page will guide you through the online registration process for all Dubai Trade related stakeholders including: Dubai Customs, DP World (Hailer / Shipping Agents & Freight Forwarders), EZW and DMCC.

Select the desired registration process from the tabs on the right side, this will direct you to a separate window that includes an illustration of 5 main registration steps: Pre-Requisites , Submission, Activation, Adding Users until finally Accessing Services.

The steps are easy to follow and include links to related training manuals which you can download for further assistance on completing your registration. To navigate through the other various Registration Processes, make a selection from the top left drop down menu.

For further assistance and enquiries on registration, please refer to the Contact Us page

  • Dubai Customs :
    Traders, Brokers and Agents
  • DP World :
    Hauliers
  • DP World :
    Shipping Line Agent and Freight Forwarders
  • Economic Zones World :
    Jafza, TechnoPark, Dubai Auto Zone
